title: My Client size won't change?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: So I just re downloaded league on my new computer and when I logged in my client, the windows size was exceptionally small. I even changed it to a 1600*900 but it was not full screen. Yet my other account was 1280*720 and almost full screen.

replies.body:
Heya, you may need to manually rescale this with your keyboard.  While focused on the client, hold the control key and tap the plus + key to increase the scaling.

Let me know if that helps!
I'm sorry but that did not work. Do you have more ideas?
